TranslationTable.Translation: Under photon generation mode, ray receiver will receive energy with extremely high power and directly store it as photons in critical state.

TranslationTable.Name: 请求功率提示
TranslationTable.Original: Show the current requested power by the ray receiver from the Dyson sphere. When the power of Dyson sphere is insufficient, actual allocated power will be less than the requested power. In addition, due to ray receiving efficiency, the requested power will be greater than the rated output power of the receiver. Requested power can be reduced by continuous operation.
TranslationTable.Translation: Show the current requested power by the ray receiver from the Dyson sphere. When the power of Dyson sphere is insufficient, actual allocated power will be less than the requested power. In addition, due to ray receiving efficiency, the requested power will be greater than the rated output power of the receiver. Requested power can be reduced by continuous operation.

TranslationTable.Translation: Show the current total requested power and total power generation performance of the Dyson sphere.

TranslationTable.Translation: Continuously receiving ray will slowly increase the  <color="#FD965ECC">Max output</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Ray receiving efficiency</color>. Progress will drop rapidly if no ray is received.

TranslationTable.Translation: Show the current theoretical max output power of the ray receiver. Can be increased by <color="#FD965ECC">Graviton lens</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Continuous working</color>.

TranslationTable.Name: 戴森球计划描述
TranslationTable.Original:
Welcome to join the Dyson Sphere Program!
You will start from scratch, from a small workshop, develop into a huge inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally build the great miracle of the universe: Dyson Sphere.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Welcome to join the Dyson Sphere Program!
You will start from scratch, from a small workshop, develop into a huge inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally build the great miracle of the universe: Dyson Sphere.

TranslationTable.Name: 电磁学描述
TranslationTable.Original: The poetry-like Maxwell's equations shows the intertwinement between electricity and magnetism. With deep understanding, create a machine for acquiring and using electrical energy with high efficiency.
TranslationTable.Translation: The poetry-like Maxwell's equations shows the intertwinement between electricity and magnetism. With deep understanding, create a machine for acquiring and using electrical energy with high efficiency.

TranslationTable.Name: 电磁矩阵描述

TranslationTable.Translation: As the foundation of all technology, Electromagnetic Matrix is one of basic source codes that keeps the CentreBrain simulating. Keep uploading it to the CentreBrain can activate more technology researches.

TranslationTable.Name: 高效电浆控制描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Under the action of electric and magnetic fields, we can use plasma more efficiently. The improved plasma exciter is more stable and has better performance.

TranslationTable.Name: 等离子萃取精炼描述
TranslationTable.Original: The applied Plasma Technology greatly increases the crude oil refining efficiency, facilitating the industrial development rapidly.
TranslationTable.Translation: The applied Plasma Technology greatly increases the crude oil refining efficiency, facilitating the industrial development rapidly.

TranslationTable.Name: X射线裂解描述
TranslationTable.Original: High-energy X-ray photocatalysis can crack the refined oil into more hydrogen, and produces the by-product energetic graphite.
TranslationTable.Translation: High-energy X-ray photocatalysis can crack the refined oil into more hydrogen, and produces the by-product energetic graphite.

TranslationTable.Name: 能量矩阵描述
TranslationTable.Original: A key that opens the Energy Gate, and another basic source code that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the Energy Matrix is used for uploading and unlock more advanced energy technologies.
TranslationTable.Translation: A key that opens the Energy Gate, and another basic source code that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the Energy Matrix is used for uploading and unlock more advanced energy technologies.

TranslationTable.Name: 氢燃料棒描述

TranslationTable.Translation: With further development of cryo-technology you can now liquefy hydrogen to make fuel rods with higher energy. These higher energy fuel rods can greatly increase the mecha's fuel power.

TranslationTable.Name: 推进器描述
TranslationTable.Original: A high effeciency engine that operates hyperspeed plasma jet as working substance to create counterforce, which can drive logistics drone to transport goods between intraplanetary logistic stations.
TranslationTable.Translation: A high effeciency engine that operates hyperspeed plasma jet as working substance to create counterforce, which can drive logistics drone to transport goods between intraplanetary logistic stations.

TranslationTable.Name: 加力推进器描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Advanced power devices, can drive logisitics vessel to transport goods among planets.

TranslationTable.Name: 流体储存封装描述
TranslationTable.Original: This technology can encapsulate the fluid in the container, making transportation more convenient.
TranslationTable.Translation: This technology can encapsulate the fluid in the container, making transportation more convenient.

TranslationTable.Name: 高分子化工描述
TranslationTable.Original: Processing refined oil and plastic through new polymer synthesis techonology will obtain a new material: Organic crystal.
TranslationTable.Translation: Processing refined oil and plastic through new polymer synthesis techonology will obtain a new material: Organic crystal.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度晶体描述
TranslationTable.Original: To obtain a titanium spar with higher strength, you can strengthened the crystal lattice structure of titanium atom by mixing precise proportion of organic crystal into titanium.
TranslationTable.Translation: To obtain a titanium spar with higher strength, you can strengthened the crystal lattice structure of titanium atom by mixing precise proportion of organic crystal into titanium.

TranslationTable.Name: 结构矩阵描述

TranslationTable.Name: 卡西米尔晶体描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Under the action of a strong electric field, a spatial ring crystal is formed by the Coulomb repulsion between particles. In a weak static magnetic field, the Casimir effect can be observed.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度玻璃描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Incorporating a certain proportion of titanium and organic crystals into the molten glass can obtain high-strength glass, which is suitable for more complex and intense industrial production.

TranslationTable.Name: 应用型超导体描述

TranslationTable.Translation: In the field of materials, the emergence of graphene is a great breakthrough. When stack one layer of graphene on top of another, and rotate the above to a certain Magic Angle, the superconductivity take place.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度材料描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Objects made of carbon nanotubes that are harder than diamond can maintain structural integrity better when subjected to greater pressure, which is very practical for industrial production that needs to withstand high pressure.

TranslationTable.Name: 粒子可控技术描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Although it is profound and complicated, it is of great benefit to master Particle Controllable technology. Under certain conditions, make the particles to have certain regularity, and when they had, everything is much easier to control.

TranslationTable.Translation: At a certain tempreture, taking advantage of the high vapour pressure ratio between liquid hydrogen and liquid deuterium, deuterium is fractionated from liquid hydrogen with a considerable separation efficiency.

TranslationTable.Name: 波函数干扰描述
TranslationTable.Original: Mastering the regularity of the probability change in the quantum transition process can execute a series of reverse interference to the wave function of the particle, thereby increasing the certainty of its collapse. Making good use of this technology may be a good thing for cats.
TranslationTable.Translation: Mastering the regularity of the probability change in the quantum transition process can execute a series of reverse interference to the wave function of the particle, thereby increasing the certainty of its collapse. Making good use of this technology may be a good thing for cats.

TranslationTable.Translation: The construction of a miniature particle collider requires advanced materials and a huge energy supply. It is expensive, while it is worthy.

TranslationTable.Name: 奇异物质描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Under the powerful energy of deuterium fusion, the iron vapor is compressed to an extremely small point, making the iron core quark changes and instantly becomes a degenerate strange matter.

The high energy utilization rate of this technology makes the core radiation stable in the visible light band, which looks like a burning mini sun.

TranslationTable.Translation: When the matter and antimatter meet, they will annihilate mutually and generate tremendous energy. As long as the annihilation process becomes more controllable, we will utilize these energy more steadily.

TranslationTable.Translation: The invention of accelerant is so exciting! Spray on cargo, substantially improving industrial production efficiency, don't forget.

TranslationTable.Translation: If the accelerant Mk.I is not fast enough for you, try accelerant Mk.II!

TranslationTable.Translation: Accelerant Mk. III greatly maximizes the production speed and has higher requirements for the design of the whole production line.

TranslationTable.Name: 量子打印技术描述

TranslationTable.Translation: We can control the arrangement and combination of particles in 3D space from a more microscopic level using quantum printing technology, which maximizes production speed.

TranslationTable.Translation: Large-scale integrated circuit devices are very good at processing data and managing the procedure.

TranslationTable.Name: 量子芯片描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Quantum chip can interfere with the wave function during the quantum transition process according to the quantum state's Rabi oscillation, increasing the probability of particles appearing in some states.

TranslationTable.Translation: Microcrystalline component with semiconductive properties is an excellent material for manufacturing processor.

TranslationTable.Original: Immediate and effective information transmission can greatly optimize the industrial production process. By uploading the Information Matrix to obtain more technologies, it is helpful to improve the information management of the automated production line.
TranslationTable.Translation: Immediate and effective information transmission can greatly optimize the industrial production process. By uploading the Information Matrix to obtain more technologies, it is helpful to improve the information management of the automated production line.

TranslationTable.Translation: The invention of Smelter has greatly promoted the development of metallurgical technology. Using smelter for automated smelting can improve production efficiency.

TranslationTable.Translation: The development of smelting process has given rise to ore purification technology, which can help to obtain purer and more advanced products.

TranslationTable.Name: 晶体冶炼描述

TranslationTable.Translation: With a better understanding of lattice structure and improved refining technology, we can now use a more advanced method to smelt high-strength crystals.

TranslationTable.Name: 钢材冶炼描述
TranslationTable.Original: Under extremely strict and controllable temperature conditions, using a smelter to smelt iron ingots will improve the crystal form of materials further, can obtain better mechanical properties.
TranslationTable.Translation: Under extremely strict and controllable temperature conditions, using a smelter to smelt iron ingots will improve the crystal form of materials further, can obtain better mechanical properties.

TranslationTable.Original: Power generation facilities that use combustibles as fuel have a conversion rate between energy output and fuel consumed.
TranslationTable.Translation: Power generation facilities that use combustibles as fuel have a conversion rate between energy output and fuel consumed.

TranslationTable.Name: 钛矿冶炼描述
TranslationTable.Original: The advancement in mining and smelting technology have made ore control easier. Titanium can now be mined and utilized.
TranslationTable.Translation: The advancement in mining and smelting technology have made ore control easier. Titanium can now be mined and utilized.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度钛合金描述
TranslationTable.Original: Taking advantage of the characteristics of the lattice structure of titanium at different temperatures, adding precise proportions of alloy elements during the smelting process, will produce a new type of alloy material that with higher strength and better toughness.
TranslationTable.Translation: Taking advantage of the characteristics of the lattice structure of titanium at different temperatures, adding precise proportions of alloy elements during the smelting process, will produce a new type of alloy material that with higher strength and better toughness.

TranslationTable.Name: 移山填海工程描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Collect soil pile from above zero altitudes and use them to fill up the ocean to make the factory construction more convenient. Just rectify the surface will consume the foundation.

TranslationTable.Name: 微型核聚变发电描述
TranslationTable.Original: By using stellarator structure to confine static high-tempreture plasma reactor core, the new generation of controlled nuclear fusion technology put standard fuel rod to supply deuterium; these technological breakthroughs promote the miniaturization of reactor miniaturization.
TranslationTable.Translation: By using stellarator structure to confine static high-tempreture plasma reactor core, the new generation of controlled nuclear fusion technology put standard fuel rod to supply deuterium; these technological breakthroughs promote the miniaturization of reactor miniaturization.

TranslationTable.Name: 太阳能收集描述
TranslationTable.Original: The sun continuously radiates energy outwards in the form of electromagnetic waves. Laying solar panels can collect these radiant energy, but it is a small part. We need a more efficient way.
TranslationTable.Translation: The sun continuously radiates energy outwards in the form of electromagnetic waves. Laying solar panels can collect these radiant energy, but it is a small part. We need a more efficient way.

TranslationTable.Name: 光子变频描述

TranslationTable.Translation: The Photon Combiner can convert low-frequency photons into high-frequency, effectively reducing solar energy loss from solar radiation.

TranslationTable.Name: 太阳帆轨道系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: Use <color="#FD965ECC">EM-Rail Ejector</color> to projectile <color="#FD965ECC">Solar sails</color> will form a Dyson swarm to absorb radiation energy from the star more effectively.
TranslationTable.Translation: Use <color="#FD965ECC">EM-Rail Ejector</color> to projectile <color="#FD965ECC">Solar sails</color> will form a Dyson swarm to absorb radiation energy from the star more effectively.

TranslationTable.Name: 射线接收站描述
TranslationTable.Original: Receiving the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly outputting energy to the power grid. Ray receiving efficiency will affect the energy obtained.
TranslationTable.Translation: Receiving the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly outputting energy to the power grid. Ray receiving efficiency will affect the energy obtained.

TranslationTable.Name: 行星电离层利用描述

TranslationTable.Translation: With the Graviton lens, it can increase the ray receiver's maximum output power by utilizing the planetary ionosphere. Of course, the premise is that the planet has an atmosphere, or this technology is useless.

TranslationTable.Name: 狄拉克逆变机制描述
TranslationTable.Original: During the research of the Dirac equation in reverse, it discovers that a large number of gamma rays can create an open string in a critical vibration state, and they will easily split into proton and antiproton pairs when they collide mutually. Mastering this technology will improve the ray receiver's efficiency, store the energy of stars as antimatter.
TranslationTable.Translation: During the research of the Dirac equation in reverse, it discovers that a large number of gamma rays can create an open string in a critical vibration state, and they will easily split into proton and antiproton pairs when they collide mutually. Mastering this technology will improve the ray receiver's efficiency, store the energy of stars as antimatter.

TranslationTable.Name: 宇宙矩阵描述
TranslationTable.Original: The Universe Matrix contains everything, matter, energy, and information. It turns out that these are all the same thing. It is the ultimate crystallization of the theory of everything, revealing the ultimate mystery of the universe.
TranslationTable.Translation: The Universe Matrix contains everything, matter, energy, and information. It turns out that these are all the same thing. It is the ultimate crystallization of the theory of everything, revealing the ultimate mystery of the universe.

TranslationTable.Name: 任务完成描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Congratulations! Builder of great civilizations! The primary mission of the Dyson Sphere Program has been successfully complete with your efforts. (The game will continue after completion)

TranslationTable.Original: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Accumulator</color> to store the surplus electrical energy in the power grid. When the power supply is insufficient, the accumulator will automatically release the stored electric energy to maintain the factory operating.
TranslationTable.Translation: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Accumulator</color> to store the surplus electrical energy in the power grid. When the power supply is insufficient, the accumulator will automatically release the stored electric energy to maintain the factory operating.

TranslationTable.Name: 星际电力运输描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Using the Energy Exchanger, the surplus electric energy in the grid can be made into a full accumulator, transported to another planet, and then released through the energy exchanger. Realize the transportation of electricity between planets.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度轻质结构描述

TranslationTable.Translation: Compared with the traditional structure, the new high-strength frame material is made of carbon nanotubes, which can withstand the strong gravitational force of stars.

TranslationTable.Name: 垂直发射井描述
TranslationTable.Original: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Small Carrier Rocket</color> to launch the <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson sphere components</color> to form the Dyson sphere frames and nodes.
TranslationTable.Translation: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Small Carrier Rocket</color> to launch the <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson sphere components</color> to form the Dyson sphere frames and nodes.

TranslationTable.Name: 戴森球应力系统描述

TranslationTable.Translation: As the latitude of the Dyson sphere nodes increases, its surface stress distribution will become more complicated and will be more difficult to maintain the balance of its stress system.

TranslationTable.Name: 基础物流系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: Use the <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor belt</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Sorter</color> to transport cargo from one place to another to achieve automated production.
TranslationTable.Translation: Use the <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor belt</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Sorter</color> to transport cargo from one place to another to achieve automated production.

TranslationTable.Name: 改良物流系统描述
TranslationTable.Original:
<color="#FD965ECC">Splitter(4-direction)</color> can diverge cargo or balance multiple conveyor belts, making the automated production lines more diverse.
Use TAB key to switch styles.
TranslationTable.Translation:
<color="#FD965ECC">Splitter(4-direction)</color> can diverge cargo or balance multiple conveyor belts, making the automated production lines more diverse.
Use TAB key to switch styles.

TranslationTable.Name: 高效物流系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: Sorter MK.II can sort cargo even faster, very useful when resources in great demand.
TranslationTable.Translation: Sorter MK.II can sort cargo even faster, very useful when resources in great demand.

TranslationTable.Name: 行星物流系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: The planetary transportation can be realized through Logistics Station and Logistic drone after the materials technology reaches a certain level. The logistics drones will automatically transport the items after the supply-demand data is setup.
TranslationTable.Translation: The planetary transportation can be realized through Logistics Station and Logistic drone after the materials technology reaches a certain level. The logistics drones will automatically transport the items after the supply-demand data is setup.

TranslationTable.Name: 星际物流系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: The magnificent space elevator realizes more convenient transportation of materials between planets.
TranslationTable.Translation: The magnificent space elevator realizes more convenient transportation of materials between planets.

TranslationTable.Name: 气态行星开采描述
TranslationTable.Original: Gas giants contain abundant resources, and the exploitation of Gas giants marks a new level of technology.
TranslationTable.Translation: Gas giants contain abundant resources, and the exploitation of Gas giants marks a new level of technology.

TranslationTable.Name: 电磁驱动描述
TranslationTable.Original: Unlocked the basic power system component: Electric Motor.
TranslationTable.Translation: Unlocked the basic power system component: Electric Motor.

TranslationTable.Name: 磁悬浮技术描述
TranslationTable.Original: The magnetic force generated by the electromagnetic turbine can make objects levitate against gravity.
TranslationTable.Translation: The magnetic force generated by the electromagnetic turbine can make objects levitate against gravity.

TranslationTable.Name: 粒子磁力阱描述
TranslationTable.Original: When material technology reaches a certain level, the particles can be binded by devices. Particles can also be guided to show certain properties.
TranslationTable.Translation: When material technology reaches a certain level, the particles can be binded by devices. Particles can also be guided to show certain properties.

TranslationTable.Name: 引力波折射描述
TranslationTable.Original: The Graviton Lens made of strange matter can produce a particular range of spatial distortion near the lens through ingenious design, which will refract the passing graviton.
TranslationTable.Translation: The Graviton Lens made of strange matter can produce a particular range of spatial distortion near the lens through ingenious design, which will refract the passing graviton.

TranslationTable.Name: 引力矩阵描述
TranslationTable.Original: One of the basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, through the study of the Gravity Matrix, finally reconciled Quantum Field Theory and General Relativity.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, through the study of the Gravity Matrix, finally reconciled Quantum Field Theory and General Relativity.

TranslationTable.Name: 超级磁场发生器描述
TranslationTable.Original: Generating high-intensity and stable artificial magnetic fields is very difficult, but it is crucial for developing other advanced technologies. Mastering super magnetic field technology is essential in the development of technology.
TranslationTable.Translation: Generating high-intensity and stable artificial magnetic fields is very difficult, but it is crucial for developing other advanced technologies. Mastering super magnetic field technology is essential in the development of technology.

TranslationTable.Name: 卫星配电系统描述
TranslationTable.Original: Using the powerful magnetic field excited by the super-magnetic ring, there is a longer power transmission distance and a larger supply area.
TranslationTable.Translation: Using the powerful magnetic field excited by the super-magnetic ring, there is a longer power transmission distance and a larger supply area.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲核心描述
TranslationTable.Original: Improve the mecha core and increase the upper limit of mecha core energy.
TranslationTable.Translation: Improve the mecha core and increase the upper limit of mecha core energy.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲核心描述2
TranslationTable.Original: Improve the mecha core and greatly increase the upper limit of mecha core energy.
TranslationTable.Translation: Improve the mecha core and greatly increase the upper limit of mecha core energy.

TranslationTable.Name: 机械骨骼描述
TranslationTable.Original: Improve the basic move speed of the mecha.
TranslationTable.Translation: Improve the basic move speed of the mecha.

TranslationTable.Name: 机械骨骼描述2
TranslationTable.Original: Improve the basic move speed of the mecha, at a cost of higher energy consumption.
TranslationTable.Translation: Improve the basic move speed of the mecha, at a cost of higher energy consumption.

TranslationTable.Name: 机舱容量描述
TranslationTable.Original: Increase the inventory capacity, allow the mecha to carry more items.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase the inventory capacity, allow the mecha to carry more items.

TranslationTable.Name: 通讯控制描述
TranslationTable.Original: The strong, stable communication network can allow the mecha to control more construction drones.
TranslationTable.Translation: The strong, stable communication network can allow the mecha to control more construction drones.

TranslationTable.Name: 通讯控制描述2
TranslationTable.Original:
Increase number of construction drones controlled. 
The more drones, the higher the building speed and energy consumption.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increase number of construction drones controlled. 
The more drones, the higher the building speed and energy consumption.

TranslationTable.Name: 通讯控制描述3
TranslationTable.Original: Each construction drone can perform more construction tasks at one time.
TranslationTable.Translation: Each construction drone can perform more construction tasks at one time.

TranslationTable.Name: 能量回路描述
TranslationTable.Original:
Increase the <color="#FD965ECC">recovery speed</color> of mecha core energy. 
The higher the fuel chamber's power, the faster the mecha converts fuel into energy.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increase the <color="#FD965ECC">recovery speed</color> of mecha core energy. 
The higher the fuel chamber's power, the faster the mecha converts fuel into energy.

TranslationTable.Name: 无人机引擎描述
TranslationTable.Original: Technological advancement in drone engines increases the flight speed of construction drones.
TranslationTable.Translation: Technological advancement in drone engines increases the flight speed of construction drones.

TranslationTable.Name: 无人机引擎描述2
TranslationTable.Original: Increase the flight speed of construction drones, at a cost of higher energy consumption.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase the flight speed of construction drones, at a cost of higher energy consumption.

TranslationTable.Name: 驱动引擎描述
TranslationTable.Original: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off, and the mecha will increase the move speed by <color="#FD965ECC">150%</color> in low-altitude flight mode, flying will consume a lot of energy.
TranslationTable.Translation: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off, and the mecha will increase the move speed by <color="#FD965ECC">150%</color> in low-altitude flight mode, flying will consume a lot of energy.

TranslationTable.Name: 驱动引擎描述2
TranslationTable.Original: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off. Hold <color="#FD965ECC">Arrow keys</color> with <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> in flight mode, which will activate sail mode at a certain altitude. In sail mode, mecha will orbit the planet at a higher speed.
TranslationTable.Translation: Double-press <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> to lift off. Hold <color="#FD965ECC">Arrow keys</color> with <color="#FD965ECC">Space</color> in flight mode, which will activate sail mode at a certain altitude. In sail mode, mecha will orbit the planet at a higher speed.

TranslationTable.Name: 驱动引擎描述3
TranslationTable.Original: Increase the max sail speed of the mecha in space, but it will greatly increase energy consumption.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase the max sail speed of the mecha in space, but it will greatly increase energy consumption.

TranslationTable.Name: 驱动引擎描述4
TranslationTable.Original: Using the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to switch on a warp, each time activate the warp will consume <color="#FD965ECC">Space warper</color> x 1.
TranslationTable.Translation: Using the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to switch on a warp, each time activate the warp will consume <color="#FD965ECC">Space warper</color> x 1.

TranslationTable.Name: 太阳帆寿命描述
TranslationTable.Original: Extend the operational life of solar sails.
TranslationTable.Translation: Extend the operational life of solar sails.

TranslationTable.Name: 射线传输效率描述
TranslationTable.Original: Reduce the energy dissipation in the solar ray transmission process to improve transmitting efficiency.
TranslationTable.Translation: Reduce the energy dissipation in the solar ray transmission process to improve transmitting efficiency.

TranslationTable.Name: 垂直建造描述
TranslationTable.Original: Increase vertical construction layers of storage, storage tank, and matrix lab to utilize space more effectively.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase vertical construction layers of storage, storage tank, and matrix lab to utilize space more effectively.

TranslationTable.Name: 分拣器货物叠加描述
TranslationTable.Original: Increase the cargo stacking for sorters Mark III.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase the cargo stacking for sorters Mark III.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输船引擎描述
TranslationTable.Original: Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输船引擎描述2
TranslationTable.Original:
Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.
Increases the navigation speed of logistics vessels.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.
Increases the navigation speed of logistics vessels.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输船引擎描述3
TranslationTable.Original:
Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.
Increases the navigation speed of logistics vessels.
Allows logistics vessels to warp.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increase the flight speed of logistics drones.
Increases the navigation speed of logistics vessels.
Allows logistics vessels to warp.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输机舱扩容描述
TranslationTable.Original: Applying material compression technology to logistics, which greatly increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones.
TranslationTable.Translation: Applying material compression technology to logistics, which greatly increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输机舱扩容描述2
TranslationTable.Original: Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones.
TranslationTable.Translation: Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输机舱扩容描述3
TranslationTable.Original:
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones. 
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics vessels.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones. 
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics vessels.

TranslationTable.Name: 运输机舱扩容描述4
TranslationTable.Original:
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones. 
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics vessels.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics drones. 
Increases the carrying capacity of logistics vessels.

TranslationTable.Name: 矿物利用描述
TranslationTable.Original: Maximizing the utilization of resources, which can greatly reduce the ores consumed in each mining operation and increase the mining speed.
TranslationTable.Translation: Maximizing the utilization of resources, which can greatly reduce the ores consumed in each mining operation and increase the mining speed.

TranslationTable.Name: 矿物利用描述2
TranslationTable.Original:
Reduce the consumed ores in each mining operation. 
Increases the mining speed.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Reduce the consumed ores in each mining operation. 
Increases the mining speed.

TranslationTable.Name: 研究速度描述
TranslationTable.Original: Strong computing power and speed greatly improve the research speed.
TranslationTable.Translation: Strong computing power and speed greatly improve the research speed.

TranslationTable.Name: 宇宙探索描述1
TranslationTable.Original: The first step on the planet is the first step toward universe exploration, everything is strange and fascinating!
TranslationTable.Translation: The first step on the planet is the first step toward universe exploration, everything is strange and fascinating!

TranslationTable.Name: 宇宙探索描述2
TranslationTable.Original: View the ore reserves of the local planetary system.
TranslationTable.Translation: View the ore reserves of the local planetary system.

TranslationTable.Name: 宇宙探索描述3
TranslationTable.Original: View the ore reserves of planetary systems within 6 light-years, keeping everything in control.
TranslationTable.Translation: View the ore reserves of planetary systems within 6 light-years, keeping everything in control.

TranslationTable.Name: 宇宙探索描述4
TranslationTable.Original: There are rare veins in the universe, finding them will greatly increase your productivity.
TranslationTable.Translation: There are rare veins in the universe, finding them will greatly increase your productivity.

TranslationTable.Name: 电磁学结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked a new automatic mining machine, which will automatically collect ores for you. Of course, its capacity is limited. You may wish to transport these minerals to the smelting facility automatically.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked a new automatic mining machine, which will automatically collect ores for you. Of course, its capacity is limited. You may wish to transport these minerals to the smelting facility automatically.

TranslationTable.Name: 电磁矩阵结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Matrix lab, or rather the CentreBrain Connector, and you will use it to upload the matrices to the CentreBrain to obtain technology.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Matrix lab, or rather the CentreBrain Connector, and you will use it to upload the matrices to the CentreBrain to obtain technology.

TranslationTable.Name: 高效电浆控制结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the Plasma Control Technology. Now you can build a Wireless Power Tower for remote power transmission and charge mecha. Then you can continue to study crude oil extraction and refining based on this technology.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the Plasma Control Technology. Now you can build a Wireless Power Tower for remote power transmission and charge mecha. Then you can continue to study crude oil extraction and refining based on this technology.

TranslationTable.Name: 等离子萃取精炼结果
TranslationTable.Original: You can now extract crude oil resources. In addition to using its energy, you can also refine it into various chemical products.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can now extract crude oil resources. In addition to using its energy, you can also refine it into various chemical products.

TranslationTable.Name: X射线裂解结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered X-ray Cracking Technology, which can crack refined oil into hydrogen and obtain energetic graphite as a by-product.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered X-ray Cracking Technology, which can crack refined oil into hydrogen and obtain energetic graphite as a by-product.

TranslationTable.Name: 能量矩阵结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Energy Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating, and the key to activate more technologies.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Energy Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating, and the key to activate more technologies.

TranslationTable.Name: 氢燃料棒结果
TranslationTable.Original: You can now produce higher-energy fuel rods. Inserting this into to the mecha's fuel chamber will greatly increase fuel power generation which will recover the mecha's energy more quickly.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can now produce higher-energy fuel rods. Inserting this into to the mecha's fuel chamber will greatly increase fuel power generation which will recover the mecha's energy more quickly.

TranslationTable.Name: 推进器结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the logistics drone's engine, the Thruster, and now you can use logistics drones to transport cargo within the planet.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the logistics drone's engine, the Thruster, and now you can use logistics drones to transport cargo within the planet.

TranslationTable.Name: 加力推进器结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the logistics vessel's engine, the Reinforced Thruster, and now you can use logistics vessels to realize the transportation of materials between planets.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the logistics vessel's engine, the Reinforced Thruster, and now you can use logistics vessels to realize the transportation of materials between planets.

TranslationTable.Name: 流体储存封装结果
TranslationTable.Original: You unlocked the Fluid Encapsulation Technology, which allows transport fluid with conveyor belts, also can store excess fluid in a large-capacity storage tank.
TranslationTable.Translation: You unlocked the Fluid Encapsulation Technology, which allows transport fluid with conveyor belts, also can store excess fluid in a large-capacity storage tank.

TranslationTable.Name: 基础化工结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered Basic Chemical Technology, and now you can use chemical plants to produce more chemical products.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered Basic Chemical Technology, and now you can use chemical plants to produce more chemical products.

TranslationTable.Name: 高分子化工结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked Polymer Chemical Technology which allows you to use chemical plants to produce organic crystals. Organic crystals can be used as fuel but they will reduce fuel generation, slowing down the mecha's energy recharge rate.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked Polymer Chemical Technology which allows you to use chemical plants to produce organic crystals. Organic crystals can be used as fuel but they will reduce fuel generation, slowing down the mecha's energy recharge rate.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度晶体结果
TranslationTable.Original: You are familiar with the production method of high-strength crystals. You can now utilize organic crystals to strengthen the lattice structure of titanium atoms. It will obtain a special titanium atom crystal, the Titanium Crystal.
TranslationTable.Translation: You are familiar with the production method of high-strength crystals. You can now utilize organic crystals to strengthen the lattice structure of titanium atoms. It will obtain a special titanium atom crystal, the Titanium Crystal.

TranslationTable.Name: 结构矩阵结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Structure Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating. Uploading the structure matrices to the CentreBrain will give you a clearer understanding of material structure.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Structure Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating. Uploading the structure matrices to the CentreBrain will give you a clearer understanding of material structure.

TranslationTable.Name: 卡西米尔晶体结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Casimir Crystal. If you find the rare ores, the Optical grating crystal, it will make the production of this crystal much easier.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Casimir Crystal. If you find the rare ores, the Optical grating crystal, it will make the production of this crystal much easier.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度玻璃结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked Titanium Glass, a high-strength glass made by adding a certain proportion of titanium to molten glass. When encountering some more intense reaction environments, titanium glass comes in handy.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked Titanium Glass, a high-strength glass made by adding a certain proportion of titanium to molten glass. When encountering some more intense reaction environments, titanium glass comes in handy.

TranslationTable.Name: 应用型超导体结果
TranslationTable.Original: You can now produce Graphene, a nano-superconducting material. Graphene is made in a Chemical Facility and can be produced with much greater efficiency through the use of a rare material called Fire Ice.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can now produce Graphene, a nano-superconducting material. Graphene is made in a Chemical Facility and can be produced with much greater efficiency through the use of a rare material called Fire Ice.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度材料结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have obtained Carbon Nanotube, a material harder than diamond. Has extremely high strength and resistance to deformation. You can go to marine planets to find rare ores, the Spiniform stalagmite crystal. It is very convenient to use them to make carbon nanotubes.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have obtained Carbon Nanotube, a material harder than diamond. Has extremely high strength and resistance to deformation. You can go to marine planets to find rare ores, the Spiniform stalagmite crystal. It is very convenient to use them to make carbon nanotubes.

TranslationTable.Name: 粒子可控技术结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the Particle Control Technology, can make particle motion have certain regularity.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the Particle Control Technology, can make particle motion have certain regularity.

TranslationTable.Name: 重氢分馏结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Deuterium Fractionation Technology. You can use a fractionator to separate some deuterium from liquid hydrogen. Although it's not perfectly efficient, possessing deuterium means that you are now entering the nuclear energy age.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Deuterium Fractionation Technology. You can use a fractionator to separate some deuterium from liquid hydrogen. Although it's not perfectly efficient, possessing deuterium means that you are now entering the nuclear energy age.

TranslationTable.Name: 波函数干扰结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the Wave Function Interference Technology. During the quantum transition, you can interfere with the particles'wave function and make them collapse toward the expected situation.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the Wave Function Interference Technology. During the quantum transition, you can interfere with the particles'wave function and make them collapse toward the expected situation.

TranslationTable.Name: 微型粒子对撞机结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Miniature Particle Collider, used to produce deuterium and antimatter stably, but will consume a lot of energy.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Miniature Particle Collider, used to produce deuterium and antimatter stably, but will consume a lot of energy.

TranslationTable.Name: 奇异物质结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have obtained Strange Matter, which can warp the surrounding space and meet the warp engine's negative energy requirement.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have obtained Strange Matter, which can warp the surrounding space and meet the warp engine's negative energy requirement.

TranslationTable.Name: 人造恒星结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the power generation facility, the Mini-sun. It can input the tremendous energy of antimatter fuel rods to the power grid in a stable and controllable way.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the power generation facility, the Mini-sun. It can input the tremendous energy of antimatter fuel rods to the power grid in a stable and controllable way.

TranslationTable.Name: 可控湮灭反应结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered how to constrain the annihilation reaction so that it can produce energy stably. With this technology, we will make antimatter into fuel rods.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered how to constrain the annihilation reaction so that it can produce energy stably. With this technology, we will make antimatter into fuel rods.

TranslationTable.Name: 加速剂 Mk.I结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.I, and now you can use the spray coater to spray the accelerant on the cargo to improve the production rate.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.I, and now you can use the spray coater to spray the accelerant on the cargo to improve the production rate.

TranslationTable.Name: 加速剂 Mk.II结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.II, and if you spray it on the cargo, the production rate will increase even more.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.II, and if you spray it on the cargo, the production rate will increase even more.

TranslationTable.Name: 加速剂 Mk.III结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.III, which can maximize the production rate, but it also needs to guarantee enough raw materials.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Accelerant MK.III, which can maximize the production rate, but it also needs to guarantee enough raw materials.

TranslationTable.Name: 基础制造工艺结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.I. You can make iron and copper ingots into more advanced products, but its speed is slower. By upgrading technology, you can get a faster assembler.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.I. You can make iron and copper ingots into more advanced products, but its speed is slower. By upgrading technology, you can get a faster assembler.

TranslationTable.Name: 高速制造工艺结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.II. You can now process raw materials more efficiently and also increase the replicator's production speed by 50%.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.II. You can now process raw materials more efficiently and also increase the replicator's production speed by 50%.

TranslationTable.Name: 量子打印技术结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.III. Using quantum printing technology can control the arrangement and combination of particles from a more microscopic level, and the assembling speed is faster. Also, the replicator's production speed is further increased by 50%.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.III. Using quantum printing technology can control the arrangement and combination of particles from a more microscopic level, and the assembling speed is faster. Also, the replicator's production speed is further increased by 50%.

TranslationTable.Name: 处理器结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Processor, a large-scale integrated circuit device that can handle more complex data operations.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Processor, a large-scale integrated circuit device that can handle more complex data operations.

TranslationTable.Name: 量子芯片结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Quantum Chip, which has more powerful computing power and ultra-fast calculating speed. It can intelligently identify an error in the quantum transition process and timely reverse intervention.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Quantum Chip, which has more powerful computing power and ultra-fast calculating speed. It can intelligently identify an error in the quantum transition process and timely reverse intervention.

TranslationTable.Name: 半导体材料结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the semiconductor material, the Microcrystalline Component, which can be used to make more complex integrated circuits.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the semiconductor material, the Microcrystalline Component, which can be used to make more complex integrated circuits.

TranslationTable.Name: 信息矩阵结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Information Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating. Uploading the structure matrices can get more information management technology, improving production efficiency.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Information Matrix, one of the five source codes to keep the CentreBrain simulating. Uploading the structure matrices can get more information management technology, improving production efficiency.

TranslationTable.Name: 自动化冶金结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Smelter, and it will automatically smelt base materials such as iron and copper ingots for you. To achieve full automation, you need to use a sorter to automatically put the ores on the conveyor belt into the smelter.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Smelter, and it will automatically smelt base materials such as iron and copper ingots for you. To achieve full automation, you need to use a sorter to automatically put the ores on the conveyor belt into the smelter.

TranslationTable.Name: 冶炼提纯结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered more advanced smelting techniques, and you can use smelter to purify ores to obtain purer materials. On a planet without silicon veins, smelting the stone ore into silicon ore is also a good choice.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered more advanced smelting techniques, and you can use smelter to purify ores to obtain purer materials. On a planet without silicon veins, smelting the stone ore into silicon ore is also a good choice.

TranslationTable.Name: 晶体冶炼结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the ultimate smelting techniques, and now you can change the atomic arrangement of the element through smelting, and quickly produce advanced materials such as diamonds.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the ultimate smelting techniques, and now you can change the atomic arrangement of the element through smelting, and quickly produce advanced materials such as diamonds.

TranslationTable.Name: 钢材冶炼结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the Steel Smelting Techniques, and now you can further smelt the iron ingots to produce steel with better mechanical properties.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the Steel Smelting Techniques, and now you can further smelt the iron ingots to produce steel with better mechanical properties.

TranslationTable.Name: 火力发电结果
TranslationTable.Original: You can now use a Thermal Power Station. It is a power generation facility that consumes combustibles to generate electricity and has energy efficiency.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can now use a Thermal Power Station. It is a power generation facility that consumes combustibles to generate electricity and has energy efficiency.

TranslationTable.Name: 钛矿冶炼结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have mastered the Titanium Ore Smelting Techniques, and now you can smelt titanium ore into light-weight and high-strength titanium ingots.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have mastered the Titanium Ore Smelting Techniques, and now you can smelt titanium ore into light-weight and high-strength titanium ingots.

TranslationTable.Name: 高强度钛合金结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have obtained a new type of alloy material, the Titanium Alloy, which has higher strength and better toughness.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have obtained a new type of alloy material, the Titanium Alloy, which has higher strength and better toughness.

TranslationTable.Name: 移山填海工程结果
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Foundation. This can flatten the surface of a planet by either leveling mountains or filling an ocean. If used to raise the land it will consume Soil piles, but if used to lower the land it will give Soil piles.
