TranslationTable.Name: I垂直发射井
TranslationTable.Original: Launch a small carrier rocket loaded with Dyson sphere components onto the Dyson sphere orbit to form nodes and frames.
TranslationTable.Translation: Launch a small carrier rocket loaded with Dyson sphere components onto the Dyson sphere orbit to form nodes and frames.

TranslationTable.Name: I喷涂机
TranslationTable.Original: Spraying Accelerants on cargo can speed up the manufacturing.
TranslationTable.Translation: Spraying Accelerants on cargo can speed up the manufacturing.

TranslationTable.Name: I分馏塔
TranslationTable.Original: Taking advantage of the high vapor pressure ratio of liquid hydrogen and liquid deuterium at a certain temperature, deuterium is fractionated from liquid hydrogen with a certain separation efficiency. Use a conveyor belt to introduce hydrogen from one side, after fractional distillation, export from the other side, and export the deuterium from the front port.
TranslationTable.Translation: Taking advantage of the high vapor pressure ratio of liquid hydrogen and liquid deuterium at a certain temperature, deuterium is fractionated from liquid hydrogen with a certain separation efficiency. Use a conveyor belt to introduce hydrogen from one side, after fractional distillation, export from the other side, and export the deuterium from the front port.

TranslationTable.Name: I矩阵研究站
TranslationTable.Original: CentreBrain's connector. Used to produce matrices and research technologies. The more the matrix labs, the faster the production and research speed.
TranslationTable.Translation: CentreBrain's connector. Used to produce matrices and research technologies. The more the matrix labs, the faster the production and research speed.

TranslationTable.Name: I物流运输机
TranslationTable.Original: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand in the intraplanetary logistics system, but it will only work for the logistics station it belongs to.
TranslationTable.Translation: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand in the intraplanetary logistics system, but it will only work for the logistics station it belongs to.

TranslationTable.Name: I星际物流运输船
TranslationTable.Original: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand of cargo between planets, and consumes space warper can activate warp.
TranslationTable.Translation: It can dynamically balance the supply and demand of cargo between planets, and consumes space warper can activate warp.

TranslationTable.Name: I电磁矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, is the foundation of all scientific and technological research.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, is the foundation of all scientific and technological research.

TranslationTable.Name: I能量矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the emergence of the energy matrix has largely promoted the further development of technology.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the emergence of the energy matrix has largely promoted the further development of technology.

TranslationTable.Name: I结构矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, can be used to unlock more advanced new structural materials.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, can be used to unlock more advanced new structural materials.

TranslationTable.Name: I信息矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the level of informatization will largely affect the production efficiency of the base.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, the level of informatization will largely affect the production efficiency of the base.

TranslationTable.Name: I引力矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, to some extent, unifies quantum field theory and general relativity.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of the five basic source codes that keep the CentreBrain simulating, to some extent, unifies quantum field theory and general relativity.

TranslationTable.Name: I宇宙矩阵
TranslationTable.Original: Includes everything, the final answer to the theory of everything, solving the ultimate mystery of the universe!
TranslationTable.Translation: Includes everything, the final answer to the theory of everything, solving the ultimate mystery of the universe!

TranslationTable.Name: I空间翘曲器
TranslationTable.Original:
Consumables. Used to activate warp of mecha and logistics vessels.
Use the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to start the warp engine.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Consumables. Used to activate warp of mecha and logistics vessels.
Use the <color="#FD965ECC">CapsLock</color> key to start the warp engine.

TranslationTable.Name: I奇异物质
TranslationTable.Original: Strange matter has a great gravitational negative pressure, which exceeds its energy density, so that the space around the strange matter is warped and meets the negative energy demand of the warp engine.
TranslationTable.Translation: Strange matter has a great gravitational negative pressure, which exceeds its energy density, so that the space around the strange matter is warped and meets the negative energy demand of the warp engine.

TranslationTable.Name: R等离子精炼
TranslationTable.Original: Hydrogen and refined oil can be obtained by refining crude oil with plasma.
TranslationTable.Translation: Hydrogen and refined oil can be obtained by refining crude oil with plasma.

TranslationTable.Name: RX射线裂解
TranslationTable.Original: Under the catalysis of hydrogen, X-rays can crack the refined oil into more hydrogen and a by-product, energetic graphite.
TranslationTable.Translation: Under the catalysis of hydrogen, X-rays can crack the refined oil into more hydrogen and a by-product, energetic graphite.

TranslationTable.Name: R卡西米尔晶体（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: The use of rare ore optical grating crystal to make Casimir crystal is more efficient.
TranslationTable.Translation: The use of rare ore optical grating crystal to make Casimir crystal is more efficient.

TranslationTable.Name: R石墨烯（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: It will be a lot easier to produce graphene if you can find combustible ice minerals.
TranslationTable.Translation: It will be a lot easier to produce graphene if you can find combustible ice minerals.

TranslationTable.Name: R碳纳米管（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: Carbon nanotube can be made directly from spiniform stalagmite crystal, but this ore is extremely rare and difficult to find.
TranslationTable.Translation: Carbon nanotube can be made directly from spiniform stalagmite crystal, but this ore is extremely rare and difficult to find.

TranslationTable.Name: R晶格硅（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: The unique fractal structure of Fractal silicon is the material of choice for the efficient production of Crystal silicon.
TranslationTable.Translation: The unique fractal structure of Fractal silicon is the material of choice for the efficient production of Crystal silicon.

TranslationTable.Name: R金刚石（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: Find Kimberlite ore and smelt directly to obtain diamond.
TranslationTable.Translation: Find Kimberlite ore and smelt directly to obtain diamond.

TranslationTable.Name: R光子合并器（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: The discovery of optical grating crystal has diversified the production of Photon combiner.
TranslationTable.Translation: The discovery of optical grating crystal has diversified the production of Photon combiner.

TranslationTable.Name: R光子物质化
TranslationTable.Original: Photons can be inverted into antimatter and hydrogen under the effect of super magnetic field.
TranslationTable.Translation: Photons can be inverted into antimatter and hydrogen under the effect of super magnetic field.

TranslationTable.Name: R粒子容器（高效）
TranslationTable.Original: Although the Unipolar magnet is extremely rare, as long as you find it, you can make Particle container more efficiently.
TranslationTable.Translation: Although the Unipolar magnet is extremely rare, as long as you find it, you can make Particle container more efficiently.

TranslationTable.Name: R重氢分馏
TranslationTable.Original: The successful fractionation of deuterium from liquid hydrogen has greatly promoted the use of nuclear fuel.
TranslationTable.Translation: The successful fractionation of deuterium from liquid hydrogen has greatly promoted the use of nuclear fuel.

TranslationTable.Name: R空间翘曲器（高级）
TranslationTable.Original: With the Gravity matrix, the production of the space warper becomes easier.
TranslationTable.Translation: With the Gravity matrix, the production of the space warper becomes easier.

TranslationTable.Name: R有机晶体（原始）
TranslationTable.Original: Organic crystal can be obtained by processing the three resources of wood, plant fuel and water.
TranslationTable.Translation: Organic crystal can be obtained by processing the three resources of wood, plant fuel and water.

TranslationTable.Name: 系统播报字幕1
TranslationTable.Original: Arrived in the designated cluster XXXXXXXX-XX
TranslationTable.Translation: Arrived in the designated cluster XXXXXXXX-XX

TranslationTable.Name: 系统播报字幕2
TranslationTable.Original: Attention! The Space capsule is about to land on the designated planet. Three......Two......One
TranslationTable.Translation: Attention! The Space capsule is about to land on the designated planet. Three......Two......One

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕1
TranslationTable.Original: Welcome to the Actual Universe! You may find it is different from our homeland, should you be able to adapt to the laws of physics in a short time. I am your advisor and will help you through this mission.
TranslationTable.Translation: Welcome to the Actual Universe! You may find it is different from our homeland, should you be able to adapt to the laws of physics in a short time. I am your advisor and will help you through this mission.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕2
TranslationTable.Original: Everything here is yours! As one of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will explore this cluster step by step, by using the resources here to construct the Dyson Sphere to provide energy for the CentreBrain to maintain homeland, starting from scratch. I have chosen a designated planet for you to start the mission, which has necessary resources for initial development. Now please drive the Space Capsule to the planet.
TranslationTable.Translation: Everything here is yours! As one of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will explore this cluster step by step, by using the resources here to construct the Dyson Sphere to provide energy for the CentreBrain to maintain homeland, starting from scratch. I have chosen a designated planet for you to start the mission, which has necessary resources for initial development. Now please drive the Space Capsule to the planet.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕3
TranslationTable.Original: Now you are about to reach the designated planet!
TranslationTable.Translation: Now you are about to reach the designated planet!

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕4
TranslationTable.Original: This is Icarus, a lightweight industrial mecha with powerful functionality. You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on the destination to control its movement. In this mission, you will manipulate Icarus to travel beyond the stars and create miracles.
TranslationTable.Translation: This is Icarus, a lightweight industrial mecha with powerful functionality. You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on the destination to control its movement. In this mission, you will manipulate Icarus to travel beyond the stars and create miracles.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕5
TranslationTable.Original: You can hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Middle Button]</color> drag to rotate the angle of view or slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to zoom in and out.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Middle Button]</color> drag to rotate the angle of view or slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to zoom in and out.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕6
TranslationTable.Original: Now try to recycle the Space Capsule, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on it to recycle.
TranslationTable.Translation: Now try to recycle the Space Capsule, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right-click]</color> on it to recycle.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕7
TranslationTable.Original: You can use the same operation to collect resources, such as trees, gravels, etc. In the meantime, hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT and Right-click]</color> to give a series of commands.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can use the same operation to collect resources, such as trees, gravels, etc. In the meantime, hold down <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT and Right-click]</color> to give a series of commands.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕8
TranslationTable.Original: You receive several items after recycling the Space Capsule. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open the Cabin to view them.
TranslationTable.Translation: You receive several items after recycling the Space Capsule. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open the Cabin to view them.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕9
TranslationTable.Original: Energy is required in all mecha activities, if it is depleted, the activities will be restricted. You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Mecha panel and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.
TranslationTable.Translation: Energy is required in all mecha activities, if it is depleted, the activities will be restricted. You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Mecha panel and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕10
TranslationTable.Original: Yet you have not unlocked the Construction Menu which will be done automatically when complete any technology research. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Technology tree (T)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Technology tree and activate a research.
TranslationTable.Translation: Yet you have not unlocked the Construction Menu which will be done automatically when complete any technology research. Click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Technology tree (T)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the Technology tree and activate a research.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕11
TranslationTable.Original: Insufficient required items! You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Replicator (F)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the panel and manually replicate these items.
TranslationTable.Translation: Insufficient required items! You can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Replicator (F)</color> button at the bottom-right of the screen to open the panel and manually replicate these items.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕12
TranslationTable.Original: You have created a <color="#61D8FFc0">mining machine</color> to achieve ore collecting automation, pick it up from the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color>, or select it on <color="#61D8FFc0">Gathering (2)</color> of Construction Menu to build it.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have created a <color="#61D8FFc0">mining machine</color> to achieve ore collecting automation, pick it up from the <color="#61D8FFc0">Inventory (E)</color>, or select it on <color="#61D8FFc0">Gathering (2)</color> of Construction Menu to build it.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕13
TranslationTable.Original: You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine for covering more veins. The more veins covered, the faster the ores will be gathered. If you want to ignore grid snapping, try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine for covering more veins. The more veins covered, the faster the ores will be gathered. If you want to ignore grid snapping, try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕14
TranslationTable.Original: One of your production facility is not powered. You need to keep it <color="#61D8FFc0">within the power coverage area</color> and supply it with <color="#61D8FFc0">power facilities</color> in order to maintain its normal works.
TranslationTable.Translation: One of your production facility is not powered. You need to keep it <color="#61D8FFc0">within the power coverage area</color> and supply it with <color="#61D8FFc0">power facilities</color> in order to maintain its normal works.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕15
TranslationTable.Original: Wind turbine! You have established your first power grid. Not all power facility has its power supply area. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Tesla tower</color> to extend the area of the power grid.
TranslationTable.Translation: Wind turbine! You have established your first power grid. Not all power facility has its power supply area. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Tesla tower</color> to extend the area of the power grid.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕16
TranslationTable.Original: You have done building the first power transmission facility Tesla tower. It can carry out <color="#61D8FFc0">short-distance</color> wireless power transmission and expand the power supply area of the power grid. Click on it to view the current power grid information.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have done building the first power transmission facility Tesla tower. It can carry out <color="#61D8FFc0">short-distance</color> wireless power transmission and expand the power supply area of the power grid. Click on it to view the current power grid information.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕17
TranslationTable.Original: Matrix Lab! You can use it to <color="#61D8FFc0">make supermatrices</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">research technologies that require them to unlock.</color> The supermatrices are the source code of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. You could upload as many supermatrices to the CentreBrain as possible. You can benefit to unlock more actual-world technologies by operating the homeworld simultaneously.
TranslationTable.Translation: Matrix Lab! You can use it to <color="#61D8FFc0">make supermatrices</color> or <color="#61D8FFc0">research technologies that require them to unlock.</color> The supermatrices are the source code of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. You could upload as many supermatrices to the CentreBrain as possible. You can benefit to unlock more actual-world technologies by operating the homeworld simultaneously.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕18
TranslationTable.Original: You built a smelter, which can smelt basic materials such as iron ingots and copper ingots automatically. While you want to make the raw materials and products get in and out of it autonomously, you need to use <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorters</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belts</color>.
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a smelter, which can smelt basic materials such as iron ingots and copper ingots automatically. While you want to make the raw materials and products get in and out of it autonomously, you need to use <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorters</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belts</color>.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕19
TranslationTable.Original: You have a building without recipe set, please set the recipe you want. After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have a building without recipe set, please set the recipe you want. After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕20
TranslationTable.Original: You have received the Sorter and the Conveyor Belt, which can achieve fully automation now. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belt</color> to transport the piled up ores from the mining machine, and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorter</color> can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belt to the smelter for automatic smelting.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have received the Sorter and the Conveyor Belt, which can achieve fully automation now. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">Conveyor Belt</color> to transport the piled up ores from the mining machine, and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Sorter</color> can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belt to the smelter for automatic smelting.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕21
TranslationTable.Original: When putting a conveyor belt, all you need to do is determine the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starting point</color> and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Endpoint</color> of it. In addition, use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↑]</color> key to lift up one level, and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↓]</color> key to drop down one level after the conveyor belt is lifted. Press <color="#61D8FFc0">[Keypad.0]</color> to reset the construction height of the conveyor belt to the ground. If you don't want the conveyor belt to be attached to the building, you can try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.
TranslationTable.Translation: When putting a conveyor belt, all you need to do is determine the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starting point</color> and the <color="#61D8FFc0">Endpoint</color> of it. In addition, use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↑]</color> key to lift up one level, and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[↓]</color> key to drop down one level after the conveyor belt is lifted. Press <color="#61D8FFc0">[Keypad.0]</color> to reset the construction height of the conveyor belt to the ground. If you don't want the conveyor belt to be attached to the building, you can try holding down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕22
TranslationTable.Original: The Sorter is a transportation connector of cargos between facilities. It will automatically transport them <color="#61D8FFc0">as long as the supply facility and the receiving facility are bridged</color>.
TranslationTable.Translation: The Sorter is a transportation connector of cargos between facilities. It will automatically transport them <color="#61D8FFc0">as long as the supply facility and the receiving facility are bridged</color>.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕23
TranslationTable.Original: This facility will produce multiple products, to divide them you need to <color="#61D8FFc0">set a filter on the Sorter</color>. You can use <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> or the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Arrow keys]</color> on the right side of the keyboard to quickly set the filter When building the Sorter.
TranslationTable.Translation: This facility will produce multiple products, to divide them you need to <color="#61D8FFc0">set a filter on the Sorter</color>. You can use <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> or the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Arrow keys]</color> on the right side of the keyboard to quickly set the filter When building the Sorter.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕24
TranslationTable.Original: You built a Storage Tank, it is more suitable for storing fluid than the Storage. Each Storage Tank can only store one single type of fluid and can be built vertically. <color="#61D8FFc0">However, once it has been removed, all the stored fluid will be lost.</color>
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a Storage Tank, it is more suitable for storing fluid than the Storage. Each Storage Tank can only store one single type of fluid and can be built vertically. <color="#61D8FFc0">However, once it has been removed, all the stored fluid will be lost.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕25
TranslationTable.Original: You can now click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Planet thumbnail</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen or press the <color="#61D8FFc0">[M]</color> key to try the planet view mode.
TranslationTable.Translation: You can now click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Planet thumbnail</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen or press the <color="#61D8FFc0">[M]</color> key to try the planet view mode.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕26
TranslationTable.Original: Now, you can try the view of the whole planetary system and even the entire cluster by clicking the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starmap (V)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen.
TranslationTable.Translation: Now, you can try the view of the whole planetary system and even the entire cluster by clicking the <color="#61D8FFc0">Starmap (V)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕27
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Universe Exploration. Now you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Details display (H)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open real-time distribution details of the ore veins.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Universe Exploration. Now you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Details display (H)</color> button in the lower-right corner of the screen to open real-time distribution details of the ore veins.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕28
TranslationTable.Original: You built a Storage, which can be used to store cargo. You can manually store, or use the sorter to automatically stock the cargo.
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a Storage, which can be used to store cargo. You can manually store, or use the sorter to automatically stock the cargo.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕29
TranslationTable.Original: You built a Wireless Power Tower, which is suitable with long-distance power transmission caused by its longer connection distance. <color="#61D8FFc0">What's exciting is that it can also charge mecha by using electricity from the grid!</color>
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a Wireless Power Tower, which is suitable with long-distance power transmission caused by its longer connection distance. <color="#61D8FFc0">What's exciting is that it can also charge mecha by using electricity from the grid!</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕30
TranslationTable.Original: A thermal power station! Such power facilities need to consume <color="#61D8FFc0">Chemical energy fuels</color>. If you want it to generate continuous and stable power, you need to ensure a sufficient fuel supply at all times.
TranslationTable.Translation: A thermal power station! Such power facilities need to consume <color="#61D8FFc0">Chemical energy fuels</color>. If you want it to generate continuous and stable power, you need to ensure a sufficient fuel supply at all times.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕31
TranslationTable.Original: Foundation, a terrain leveling tool, <color="#61D8FFc0">yet we cannot use it to change the planetary landforms at will. We can only level the surface to ground zero.</color> If the foundation is used for high grounds, it will gain soil pile; on the contrary, if it is used on the ocean or low-lying areas, it must consume soil pile. When installing the foundation, either choose a kind of decoration, or without decoration, even only surface leveling.
TranslationTable.Translation: Foundation, a terrain leveling tool, <color="#61D8FFc0">yet we cannot use it to change the planetary landforms at will. We can only level the surface to ground zero.</color> If the foundation is used for high grounds, it will gain soil pile; on the contrary, if it is used on the ocean or low-lying areas, it must consume soil pile. When installing the foundation, either choose a kind of decoration, or without decoration, even only surface leveling.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕32
TranslationTable.Original: The data shows this is a planet without natural Silicon veins. However, you can still obtain some by smelting stone ore. While you need a massive silicon collection, you need to find a planet riched with Silicon veins ASAP.
TranslationTable.Translation: The data shows this is a planet without natural Silicon veins. However, you can still obtain some by smelting stone ore. While you need a massive silicon collection, you need to find a planet riched with Silicon veins ASAP.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕33
TranslationTable.Original: The data shows this is a planet without natural Titanium veins, perhaps you can get some by collecting gravels. If you need a massive titanium collection, you need to find a planet riched with Titanium veins ASAP.
TranslationTable.Translation: The data shows this is a planet without natural Titanium veins, perhaps you can get some by collecting gravels. If you need a massive titanium collection, you need to find a planet riched with Titanium veins ASAP.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕34
TranslationTable.Original: You built a Fractionator, which can randomly fractionate several deuterium out of liquid hydrogen. <color="#61D8FFc0">Use a conveyor belt to import hydrogen from one side, export from the opposite side, and the deuterium will export from the front port after fractional distillation.</color> You may want to increase the deuterium's production rate, you can accelerate the speed of materials in and out or build more fractionators.
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a Fractionator, which can randomly fractionate several deuterium out of liquid hydrogen. <color="#61D8FFc0">Use a conveyor belt to import hydrogen from one side, export from the opposite side, and the deuterium will export from the front port after fractional distillation.</color> You may want to increase the deuterium's production rate, you can accelerate the speed of materials in and out or build more fractionators.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕35
TranslationTable.Original: Logistics Station! You have taken the first step to establish the intra-planetary logistics transportation network. Provided the place of the logistics station of the raw material is set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Supply</color>, the logistic drones will transport cargo to else where with a <color="#61D8FFc0">Demand</color> on the planet automatically. <color="#61D8FFc0">Never forget to put the logistic drones in the logistics station, either the supply or the demand side,</color> the logistic drones will only work for the transportation station they belonging to.
TranslationTable.Translation: Logistics Station! You have taken the first step to establish the intra-planetary logistics transportation network. Provided the place of the logistics station of the raw material is set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Supply</color>, the logistic drones will transport cargo to else where with a <color="#61D8FFc0">Demand</color> on the planet automatically. <color="#61D8FFc0">Never forget to put the logistic drones in the logistics station, either the supply or the demand side,</color> the logistic drones will only work for the transportation station they belonging to.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕36
TranslationTable.Original: Your production compound has reached a certain scale. Now, click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Statistics panel (P)</color> button at the bottom right corner of the screen to view statistics, it includes the output consumption of each item, electricity data, etc. Use these dynamic data can help you manage your production base.
TranslationTable.Translation: Your production compound has reached a certain scale. Now, click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Statistics panel (P)</color> button at the bottom right corner of the screen to view statistics, it includes the output consumption of each item, electricity data, etc. Use these dynamic data can help you manage your production base.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕37
TranslationTable.Original: You have established an interstellar logistics station and open the first node of logistics transportation among the planets. With it, no need to transport cargo between planets manually anymore. Just set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote supply</color> in the site on the raw material supply planet, the logistic vessels will bring the cargo to other planets with corresponding <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote demand</color> sites accordingly. Setting local supply and demand can also inherit the functions of ordinary logistics stations at the same time.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have established an interstellar logistics station and open the first node of logistics transportation among the planets. With it, no need to transport cargo between planets manually anymore. Just set to <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote supply</color> in the site on the raw material supply planet, the logistic vessels will bring the cargo to other planets with corresponding <color="#61D8FFc0">Remote demand</color> sites accordingly. Setting local supply and demand can also inherit the functions of ordinary logistics stations at the same time.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕38
TranslationTable.Original: You have built a powerful energy exchanger and can use it to quickly fill the accumulator with the surplus electricity in the grid; you can also release the electric energy stored in the full accumulator with the same speed. With a stable logistics guarantee, it can continuously supply the grid with power.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have built a powerful energy exchanger and can use it to quickly fill the accumulator with the surplus electricity in the grid; you can also release the electric energy stored in the full accumulator with the same speed. With a stable logistics guarantee, it can continuously supply the grid with power.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕39
TranslationTable.Original: You have built an orbital collector, which can collect the resources of this Gas Giant automatically. The logistic vessels will come to pick up the cargo as long as you set these resources as <color="#61D8FFc0">Interstellar demand</color> at other sites. Furthermore, to maintain the collector working, the collected resources will be transfer to energy in the first place.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have built an orbital collector, which can collect the resources of this Gas Giant automatically. The logistic vessels will come to pick up the cargo as long as you set these resources as <color="#61D8FFc0">Interstellar demand</color> at other sites. Furthermore, to maintain the collector working, the collected resources will be transfer to energy in the first place.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕40
TranslationTable.Original: Rare veins scatter around different planets. They will greatly improve production efficiency, so if you find them, collect them and put them as a part of industrial production.
TranslationTable.Translation: Rare veins scatter around different planets. They will greatly improve production efficiency, so if you find them, collect them and put them as a part of industrial production.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕41
TranslationTable.Original: An EM-Rail Ejector! You have taken the first step to build the Dyson Sphere. Now you can use it to send Solar Sails into space for forming the Dyson swarm. <color="#61D8FFc0">Each EM-Rail Ejector requires to set up orbit and supply with Solar Sails.</color> Also, you can use copy and paste to set orbits. If you want a Dyson swarm orbit become more diversified, you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Dyson sphere (Y)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen to open the Dyson Sphere panel, make your customization however you want.
TranslationTable.Translation: An EM-Rail Ejector! You have taken the first step to build the Dyson Sphere. Now you can use it to send Solar Sails into space for forming the Dyson swarm. <color="#61D8FFc0">Each EM-Rail Ejector requires to set up orbit and supply with Solar Sails.</color> Also, you can use copy and paste to set orbits. If you want a Dyson swarm orbit become more diversified, you can click the <color="#61D8FFc0">Dyson sphere (Y)</color> button in the lower-left corner of the screen to open the Dyson Sphere panel, make your customization however you want.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕42
TranslationTable.Original: The amount of your Solar Sails has reached a certain scale, and they have formed a Dyson Swarm around the star. You should be able to clearly see it right now. To receive such energy, you have to build <color="#61D8FFc0">a Ray Receiver</color> to absorb the transmission, where Dyson Swarm can generate power simultaneously. Every Solar Sail launched for a certain life cycle, if you want to maintain the Dyson Swarm, you have to continue on ejecting the Solar Sails.
TranslationTable.Translation: The amount of your Solar Sails has reached a certain scale, and they have formed a Dyson Swarm around the star. You should be able to clearly see it right now. To receive such energy, you have to build <color="#61D8FFc0">a Ray Receiver</color> to absorb the transmission, where Dyson Swarm can generate power simultaneously. Every Solar Sail launched for a certain life cycle, if you want to maintain the Dyson Swarm, you have to continue on ejecting the Solar Sails.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕43
TranslationTable.Original: You built a ray receiver, which can receive the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly input them to the power grid. However, caused by the ray receiving efficiency, the ray receiver's requested power will be larger than the documented output power of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">You can keep it working or upgrade technologies to increase the ray receiving efficiency.</color>
TranslationTable.Translation: You built a ray receiver, which can receive the high-energy rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere and directly input them to the power grid. However, caused by the ray receiving efficiency, the ray receiver's requested power will be larger than the documented output power of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">You can keep it working or upgrade technologies to increase the ray receiving efficiency.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕44
TranslationTable.Original: You have built a Vertical Launching Silo, now you can use it to construct the main structure of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">But before that, you need to enter the Dyson sphere panel to finish planning the Dyson sphere nodes and frames.</color> After the plan is completed, the Vertical Launching Silo will automatically launch <color="#61D8FFc0">Small carrier rockets loaded with Dyson sphere components</color> to build the nodes and frames. Each rocket provides one structure point, and you can use the Vertical Launching Silo panel to master the required structure points.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have built a Vertical Launching Silo, now you can use it to construct the main structure of the Dyson sphere. <color="#61D8FFc0">But before that, you need to enter the Dyson sphere panel to finish planning the Dyson sphere nodes and frames.</color> After the plan is completed, the Vertical Launching Silo will automatically launch <color="#61D8FFc0">Small carrier rockets loaded with Dyson sphere components</color> to build the nodes and frames. Each rocket provides one structure point, and you can use the Vertical Launching Silo panel to master the required structure points.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕45
TranslationTable.Original: You have finished a Dyson shell planning. Once nodes and frames are done construction, <color="#61D8FFc0">the Dyson shell will put Solar Sails to use automatically.</color> Each Solar Sails provides one cell point, and you can click the shell to view the total number of cell points required.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have finished a Dyson shell planning. Once nodes and frames are done construction, <color="#61D8FFc0">the Dyson shell will put Solar Sails to use automatically.</color> Each Solar Sails provides one cell point, and you can click the shell to view the total number of cell points required.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕46
TranslationTable.Original: Splitter (with 4-directions)! It can split the passing cargo or balance the cargo on multiple conveyor belts, the splitting speed depends on the conveyor belt's speed. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> key to switch between different styles, and click it to set priorities and filters.
TranslationTable.Translation: Splitter (with 4-directions)! It can split the passing cargo or balance the cargo on multiple conveyor belts, the splitting speed depends on the conveyor belt's speed. Use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[TAB]</color> key to switch between different styles, and click it to set priorities and filters.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕47
TranslationTable.Original: When being outside of building range, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on the open space to control the mecha to move.
TranslationTable.Translation: When being outside of building range, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key and use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on the open space to control the mecha to move.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕48
TranslationTable.Original: You have received the ability to fly, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off, and then use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> to control mecha movement. The moving speed will increase by <color="#61D8FFc0">150%</color> with more energy consumed under Flight Mode. Pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[ALT]</color> key can return the mecha to the ground during the flight.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have received the ability to fly, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off, and then use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Direction keys]</color> to control mecha movement. The moving speed will increase by <color="#61D8FFc0">150%</color> with more energy consumed under Flight Mode. Pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[ALT]</color> key can return the mecha to the ground during the flight.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕49
TranslationTable.Original: You have received the ability to Sail, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off to enter the Flight Mode, and keep pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Forward direction]</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> keys in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have received the ability to Sail, double-click the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> key to lift off to enter the Flight Mode, and keep pressing the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Forward direction]</color> and <color="#61D8FFc0">[SPACE]</color> keys in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕50
TranslationTable.Original: In Sailing Mode, you can control the mecha go to different planets or planetary systems by following <color="#61D8FFc0">the arrows in the Space Navigation,</color> hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key to accelerate, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Backward key]</color> to slow down. You can also use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Q]/[R]</color> keys or hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse button]</color> dragging to sideward flight.
TranslationTable.Translation: In Sailing Mode, you can control the mecha go to different planets or planetary systems by following <color="#61D8FFc0">the arrows in the Space Navigation,</color> hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[SHIFT]</color> key to accelerate, <color="#61D8FFc0">[Backward key]</color> to slow down. You can also use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Q]/[R]</color> keys or hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse button]</color> dragging to sideward flight.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕51
TranslationTable.Original: You have reached the ability to warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, <color="#61D8FFc0">it will consume a great amount of energy and an additional Space Warper.</color> If you want to travel freely between the stars, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have reached the ability to warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, <color="#61D8FFc0">it will consume a great amount of energy and an additional Space Warper.</color> If you want to travel freely between the stars, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕52
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Vertical construction technology. When building facilities such as Matrix Lab, Storage, and Storage Tank, you can try to build them vertically to make more efficiency use of space.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Vertical construction technology. When building facilities such as Matrix Lab, Storage, and Storage Tank, you can try to build them vertically to make more efficiency use of space.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕53
TranslationTable.Original: You have unlocked the Logistics carrier engine Level 4. It allows the logistic vessels to warp, <color="#61D8FFc0">but they will consume two Space Warpers back and forth to transport cargo,</color> so needs to make sure there are enough Space Warpers in the Interstellar Logistics Station at any time.
TranslationTable.Translation: You have unlocked the Logistics carrier engine Level 4. It allows the logistic vessels to warp, <color="#61D8FFc0">but they will consume two Space Warpers back and forth to transport cargo,</color> so needs to make sure there are enough Space Warpers in the Interstellar Logistics Station at any time.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕54
TranslationTable.Original: You demolish the structure of the Dyson sphere, it will scatter the Solar Sails, and this will temporarily increase the total power generation of the Dyson sphere, <color="#61D8FFc0">but these scattered Solar Sails will regain their life cycle.</color>
TranslationTable.Translation: You demolish the structure of the Dyson sphere, it will scatter the Solar Sails, and this will temporarily increase the total power generation of the Dyson sphere, <color="#61D8FFc0">but these scattered Solar Sails will regain their life cycle.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕55
TranslationTable.Original: <color="#61D8FFc0">Congratulations! Builder of great civilizations!</color> The primary mission of the Dyson Sphere Program has been successfully complete with your efforts. The energy you provide is bound to make the homeland develop with high speed, and your figure will imprint with every step forward. This cluster has been activated, to remember your achievements, people light up a star in the Milky Way Starmap. Yes, it will always record your contribution to the forthcoming Third-level civilization. Now please rest a while, and then embark on the journey of the sea of stars again.
TranslationTable.Translation: <color="#61D8FFc0">Congratulations! Builder of great civilizations!</color> The primary mission of the Dyson Sphere Program has been successfully complete with your efforts. The energy you provide is bound to make the homeland develop with high speed, and your figure will imprint with every step forward. This cluster has been activated, to remember your achievements, people light up a star in the Milky Way Starmap. Yes, it will always record your contribution to the forthcoming Third-level civilization. Now please rest a while, and then embark on the journey of the sea of stars again.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕56
TranslationTable.Original: After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.
TranslationTable.Translation: After selecting the recipe, you can use the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＜]</color> key to copy the recipe and the <color="#61D8FFc0">[＞]</color> key to paste to the next building that needs to set the same recipe.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕57
TranslationTable.Original: In the planet view mode, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Middle Mouse Button]</color> drag, rotate the angle of view, and hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse Button]</color> drag to roll the angle of view, press <color="#61D8FFc0">[N]</color> key to point to the front to the north pole.
TranslationTable.Translation: In the planet view mode, you can hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Middle Mouse Button]</color> drag, rotate the angle of view, and hold down the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Right Mouse Button]</color> drag to roll the angle of view, press <color="#61D8FFc0">[N]</color> key to point to the front to the north pole.

TranslationTable.Name: 顾问字幕58
TranslationTable.Original: In the planet view mode, slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to enter the Starmap Mode.
TranslationTable.Translation: In the planet view mode, slide the <color="#61D8FFc0">[Mouse Wheel]</color> to enter the Starmap Mode.

TranslationTable.Name: 前情介绍前字
TranslationTable.Original:
In the future, human beings enter the ranks of advanced civilizations, and the power of science and technology brings rapid development. People use virtual reality to iterate space and time, create a virtual universe much larger than the real world, and gradually transfer human consciousness to the virtual universe.

The operation of the virtual world requires supercomputing power. For this reason, human beings circle the sun and create a supercomputer, the CentreBrain, hoping to use its powerful computing power to expand the virtual home. The computing power of the CentreBrain gradually reaches its limit because the number of consciousness continues to grow. If want to accommodate more consciousness, it needs more energy supply. So, the COSMO launched an engineering project code-named Dyson Sphere Program, sending engineers to the real world to build the Dyson sphere to provide continuous and stable energy for the CentreBrain. As a member of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will control the mecha on an unknown journey by using the terminal. You need gather resources, plan and design production lines, gradually realize full automation, starting from scratch. And transform your factory from a small workshop, developing into a magnificent inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally built a great miracle, the Dyson Sphere.

Builders of great civilizations! In this process, you are bound to encounter many difficulties. After all, the universe is so large that anything can happen. However, your creativity and imagination will help you accomplish this great goal. The entire cluster will become the cornerstone of human civilization under your plan.
TranslationTable.Translation:
In the future, human beings enter the ranks of advanced civilizations, and the power of science and technology brings rapid development. People use virtual reality to iterate space and time, create a virtual universe much larger than the real world, and gradually transfer human consciousness to the virtual universe.

The operation of the virtual world requires supercomputing power. For this reason, human beings circle the sun and create a supercomputer, the CentreBrain, hoping to use its powerful computing power to expand the virtual home. The computing power of the CentreBrain gradually reaches its limit because the number of consciousness continues to grow. If want to accommodate more consciousness, it needs more energy supply. So, the COSMO launched an engineering project code-named Dyson Sphere Program, sending engineers to the real world to build the Dyson sphere to provide continuous and stable energy for the CentreBrain. As a member of COSMO and the pioneer of the Dyson Sphere Program, you will control the mecha on an unknown journey by using the terminal. You need gather resources, plan and design production lines, gradually realize full automation, starting from scratch. And transform your factory from a small workshop, developing into a magnificent inter-galactic industrial empire, and finally built a great miracle, the Dyson Sphere.

Builders of great civilizations! In this process, you are bound to encounter many difficulties. After all, the universe is so large that anything can happen. However, your creativity and imagination will help you accomplish this great goal. The entire cluster will become the cornerstone of human civilization under your plan.

TranslationTable.Name: 戴森球介绍前字
TranslationTable.Original:
As civilization continues to develop, the demand for energy will continue to increase in the vast universe. Develop the star's energy becomes an inevitable choice for civilization's development when the energy on the planet can no longer sustain.

In 1960, Mr. Freeman Dyson put forward a legendary concept, the Dyson Sphere theory. <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson Sphere is an imaginary space giant that can surround the entire star and obtain most or all of its energy output.</color>
TranslationTable.Translation:
As civilization continues to develop, the demand for energy will continue to increase in the vast universe. Develop the star's energy becomes an inevitable choice for civilization's development when the energy on the planet can no longer sustain.

In 1960, Mr. Freeman Dyson put forward a legendary concept, the Dyson Sphere theory. <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson Sphere is an imaginary space giant that can surround the entire star and obtain most or all of its energy output.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 戴森球介绍后字
采集资源指令前字
TranslationTable.Original:
You can use <color="#FD965ECC">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on a ground target to command mecha to there. If the target is a resource, you can order the mecha to gather.

Also, for more convenient operation, <color="#FD965ECC">hold down [SHIFT] + [Right mouse button]</color> to give a series of commands, such as continuously felling trees or moving to the target after felling.
TranslationTable.Translation:
You can use <color="#FD965ECC">[Right mouse button]</color> to click on a ground target to command mecha to there. If the target is a resource, you can order the mecha to gather.

Also, for more convenient operation, <color="#FD965ECC">hold down [SHIFT] + [Right mouse button]</color> to give a series of commands, such as continuously felling trees or moving to the target after felling.

TranslationTable.Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖标题
TranslationTable.Original: Build Mining Machine and Veins Coverage
TranslationTable.Translation: Build Mining Machine and Veins Coverage

TranslationTable.Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖前字
TranslationTable.Original:
The mining machine can automatically gather ores. Use the <color="#FD965ECC">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine so that its fan-shaped area covers the veins, rotating <color="#FD965ECC">90°</color> each time.
Press and hold <color="#FD965ECC">[SHIFT]</color> to ignore the snapping to the construction grid. At this time, you can more finely adjust the position and rotation of the mining machine to cover more veins.
TranslationTable.Translation:
The mining machine can automatically gather ores. Use the <color="#FD965ECC">[R]</color> key to rotate the mining machine so that its fan-shaped area covers the veins, rotating <color="#FD965ECC">90°</color> each time.
Press and hold <color="#FD965ECC">[SHIFT]</color> to ignore the snapping to the construction grid. At this time, you can more finely adjust the position and rotation of the mining machine to cover more veins.

TranslationTable.Name: 采矿机搭建及矿脉覆盖后字
TranslationTable.Original:
The more veins covered by the mining machine, the gathering speed is faster. Each covered vein provides a basic capacity of <color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>. The consumption rate of each vein is consistent because the Mining machine consumes the covered veins in turn. When one of the covered veins is exhausted, the production capacity of the mining machine will decrease.

Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.

A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.

By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.
TranslationTable.Translation:
The more veins covered by the mining machine, the gathering speed is faster. Each covered vein provides a basic capacity of <color="#FD965ECC">30/min</color>. The consumption rate of each vein is consistent because the Mining machine consumes the covered veins in turn. When one of the covered veins is exhausted, the production capacity of the mining machine will decrease.

Veins coverage is not the more the better. In many cases, it is necessary to determine the number of veins covered according to the balance of output and consumption.

A single vein can be covered by multiple mining machines. The more mining machines covering it, the consumption rate is faster.

By continuously upgrade the <color="#FD965ECC">Mineral Utilization Technology</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Technology Tree (T), Upgrade section,</color> you can increase the mining speed of mining machines and reduce the loss of veins caused by mining operations.

TranslationTable.Name: 电网建立指南前字
TranslationTable.Original:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.

There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.

If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power. 
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>
TranslationTable.Translation:
For production facilities to work, they need to connect to the grid, and there must be power generation facilities in the grid to provide electricity.

There are <color="#FD965ECC">power generation facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power consumption facilities</color>, <color="#FD965ECC">power storage facilities</color>, and <color="#FD965ECC">power transmission facilities</color> in the power grid.

If the power generation of the power grid is greater than power consumption, the power consumption facilities will run at full load. And the accumulators will store the surplus electricity with a certain power. 
If the power generation of the power grid is less than power consumption, the accumulators will firstly discharge with a certain power to fill the power gap. If still not to fill the power gap after all accumulators automatically discharging at the max power, the power consumption facilities will slow down work speed due to insufficient power.
<color="#FD965ECC">Once the satisfaction of the power grid is less than 10%, the power grid will trip. At the same time, the production facilities will stop working.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 电网建立指南后字
TranslationTable.Original:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.

Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.

Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.

You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.
TranslationTable.Translation:
In the early stage, you can use Wind turbines to generate electricity. Wind turbines use wind power to generate electricity and do not need to consume fuels. It is a very practical power generation facility for early development. Besides, different planets have different wind energy ratio.

Wind turbines come with a power supply area, but this area is very small. If you want to expand the power grid's supply range, <color="#FD965ECC">you need to use the Tesla tower to transmit and supply power.</color> Different power transmission facilities have different connection lengths and supply areas. You can unlock more advanced power transmission facilities by upgrading Technology.

Power generation facilities that require fuels will consume fuels based on the actual consumption power.

You can view the current power grid information and adjust it at any time based on the consumption demand by clicking the Tesla tower. Can always display the power network when turn on the <color="#FD965ECC">Power network</color> in the <color="#FD965ECC">Detail display (H)</color>.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲核心能量前字
TranslationTable.Original:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.

When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.
TranslationTable.Translation:
The mecha consumes core energy when moving, gathering, building, replicate items, and using its lab research technologies. The core energy bar and value are displayed directly below the screen.

When the core energy is insufficient, all activities will be restricted, such as slower move speed and unable to research, etc. So, you need to pay attention to the use of mecha core energy at any time. Once the core energy is insufficient, you can click the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel (C)</color> button at the bottom-right corner of the screen to open the <color="#FD965ECC">Mecha panel</color> and resupply fuel into the fuel chamber.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲核心能量后字
TranslationTable.Original:
Converting fuel energy into core energy through the Fuel chamber will recover the core energy of the mecha. The Fuel chamber's power is higher, the speed of energy recovery is faster.

In the early stage, gathering trees and plants on the planet can obtain two primary fuels: <color="#FD965ECC">Logs</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Plant fuels</color>. <color="#FD965ECC">Coals</color> are also good fuel choices.
High-grade fuels not only contain more energy than low-grade fuel, but they also increase the mecha fuel power, allowing the mecha to recover energy more quickly.

In addition to the Fuel chamber, the mecha core also comes with a weak power generation.

You can move the mouse to the value at the right of the core energy bar to view the specific usage details.

TranslationTable.Name: 矩阵研究站介绍前字
TranslationTable.Original:
The Matrix lab is the hub of connecting the real world and the CentreBrain. It has two modes: Matrix and Research.

The Matrix mode is to produce matrices.
The Research mode is to consume the supermatrices to research technologies. And can only research the technologies that require the supermatrices to unlock.

Once select the research mode, the Matrix labs will automatically research the currently ongoing technology, and all Matrix labs share the same research progress.

<color="#FD965ECC">This will greatly increase the research speed by using multiple Matrix labs to research the same technology at the same time!</color>

Each Matrix lab contributes a basic research speed of <color="#FD965ECC">60hash/s</color>. Only you put all the matrices required by the technology into the Matrix lab, it will start research.

TranslationTable.Name: 矩阵研究站介绍后字
TranslationTable.Original:
<color="#FD965ECC">The Matrix labs can be built on the planet's surface, and can also be built in the vertical direction.</color>
Vertically constructed Matrix labs, only supplying sufficient raw materials on the lower level, the Matrix labs will automatically transport the raw materials to the upper level and transport the products back to the first level at the same time. Also, just set the operating mode of any layer, and the Matrix labs on other layers will automatically synchronize.

(The supermatrices are the source codes of the CentreBrain for maintaining the homeworld. By uploading the supermatrices to the CentreBrain, after the CentreBrain analysis, the obtained technology will be transmitted back. You can benefit from promoting the development of the base by operating the homeworld simultaneously.)

TranslationTable.Name: 配方复制操作前字
TranslationTable.Original:
<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>

If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.

<color="#FD965ECC">Each production facility needs to set a recipe. Otherwise, it will not work.</color>

If you need to set the same recipe (or settings) for the same type of building, use the <color="#FD965ECC">[＜]</color> key to copy one of the production facilities that has set the recipe. And then, use the mouse to point to another production facility that needs the same recipe, press <color="#FD965ECC">[＞]</color> key to paste.

TranslationTable.Name: 传送带和分拣器前字
TranslationTable.Original:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>

Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the piled-up ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.
TranslationTable.Translation:
<color="#FD965ECC">With Conveyor belts and Sorters, you can achieve full automation now.</color>

Different production facilities have different slots. Some can directly connect to conveyor belts, such as Mining machines. Some use the sorters to bridge supply facilities and receiving facilities, such as Smelters. You can Use the Conveyor belts to transport the piled-up ores from the Mining machines, and then use the Sorters to connect the conveyor belts to the smelters. The Sorters can deliver the ores from the Conveyor Belts to the smelters for automatic smelting.

TranslationTable.Name: 传送带和分拣器后字
TranslationTable.Original:
When putting on conveyor belts, all you need to do is determine the Starting point and the Endpoint to plan the conveyor belt route.
When planning the conveyor belt, <color="#FD965ECC">press [↑] to lift the target height one level, and press [↓] to drop down the target height one level. And if you need to reset to the ground height, press [Keypad.0].</color>

Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>

Usually, the conveyor belt will automatically snap to the overlapping buildings. <color="#FD965ECC">You can press and hold the [SHIFT] key to ignore the snapping.</color>

TranslationTable.Name: 射线接收站工作机制标题
射线接收站工作机制前字
TranslationTable.Original:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>. 

Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid. 
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be five times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons. 

The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.
TranslationTable.Translation:
The ray receiver can receive the high-energy Gamma rays transmitted from the Dyson sphere(Dyson swarm). It has two different modes: <color="#FD965ECC">Power generation</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Photon generation</color>. 

Power generation mode means that the ray receiver directly outputs the received energy to the grid. 
<color="#FD965ECC">After upgrading the Dirac inversion mechanism technology, you can unlock the Photon generation mode.</color> Under the Photon generation mode, the receiving power of the ray receiver will be five times. Use this ultra-high power can directly convert the received energy into Critical photons. 

The Miniature particle collider can easily convert critical photons into antimatter and hydrogen, realizing energy storage as antimatter.

TranslationTable.Name: 射线接收站工作机制后字
TranslationTable.Original:
High-energy Gamma rays will lose energy during transmission. Therefore, there is a transmission efficiency when energy is transmitted from the Dyson sphere to the ray receiver. Upgrading technology or letting the ray receiver continue to work can improve the ray transmission efficiency. 

The basic received power of each ray receiver is 5MW. Continuously working or consuming Graviton lens will increase the actual power. When the ray receiver cannot receive rays because it is in the shadow of the planet, the progress of continuous reception will drop rapidly.

When the continuous work progress reaches 100%, the received power becomes 2.5 times, and the energy loss is reduced by 40% on the current basis.
<color="#FD965ECC">When put in the Graviton lens, the receiving power becomes 2 times.</color> Besides, with the application of Planetary ionosphere utilization technology, the effective receiving altitude will extend to the top of the atmosphere. It allows more time to receive high-energy Gamma rays in a day and night cycle, improving the continuous work progress.

Consider all the above bonus factors:
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Power generation mode is 25MW.</color>
<color="#FD965ECC">The theoretical max power of Photon generation mode is 125MW.</color>

After determining the real-time receiving power of the ray receiver according to the above principles, it will request energy from the Dyson sphere.
Because of the receiving efficiency, the Requested power (Actual power consumption on Dyson sphere) = Current ray receiver power / Current receiving efficiency.
The Dyson sphere will allocate the power to each ray receiver according to the requested power weight, When the total power generation performance of the Dyson sphere cannot meet the requested power of all ray receivers.

Besides, the ray receiver will request energy from the Dyson sphere at the max power it can reach at this time, regardless of the current load of the power grid.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲基本操作前字
TranslationTable.Original:
Use the [W] [S] [A] [D] direction keys to control the movement of the mecha, or use the [Right mouse button] to click on the destination to send a move command to the mecha.

Click the [SPACE] button to make the mecha jump.

If the mecha encounters water during its movement, it will automatically enter the drift state. In the drift state, the mecha consumes more energy than moving on land.
TranslationTable.Translation:
Use the [W] [S] [A] [D] direction keys to control the movement of the mecha, or use the [Right mouse button] to click on the destination to send a move command to the mecha.

Click the [SPACE] button to make the mecha jump.

If the mecha encounters water during its movement, it will automatically enter the drift state. In the drift state, the mecha consumes more energy than moving on land.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲基本操作后字
TranslationTable.Original:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 1, you obtain flying ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Double-click the [SPACE] key</color> to lift off, and then use the [W] [S] [A] [D] to control mecha flying at low altitude. The moving speed will increase by 150% with more energy consumed under Flight Mode.

During the flight, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[SPACE]</color> key to increase the flight altitude, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[ALT]</color> key to decrease the flight altitude or return the mecha to the ground during the flight.

After unlocking the Drive Engine Level 2, you obtain the sailing ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Keep pressing the [Forward key] and [SPACE] key</color> in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.
TranslationTable.Translation:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 1, you obtain flying ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Double-click the [SPACE] key</color> to lift off, and then use the [W] [S] [A] [D] to control mecha flying at low altitude. The moving speed will increase by 150% with more energy consumed under Flight Mode.

During the flight, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[SPACE]</color> key to increase the flight altitude, press the <color="#FD965ECC">[ALT]</color> key to decrease the flight altitude or return the mecha to the ground during the flight.

After unlocking the Drive Engine Level 2, you obtain the sailing ability. <color="#FD965ECC">Keep pressing the [Forward key] and [SPACE] key</color> in the Flight Mode, and you will enter the Sailing Mode when you reach a certain altitude.

TranslationTable.Name: 机甲航行操作前字
机甲航行操作后字
TranslationTable.Original:
After unlocking Drive Engine Level 4, you will gain the ability to warp, and you can cross the distance between galaxies in a short time.
If you want to warp, you need to prepare sufficient energy and Space Warpers.

The Space Warpers are necessary consumable for the mecha warp. When you are out of the planetary gravitational range, you can use the <color="#FD965ECC">[CAPSLOCK]</color> key to turn on the warp. Each time you turn it on, it will consume a great amount of energy and <color="#FD965ECC">an additional Space Warper</color>.
